amendment.description: Amendment allows the Air National Guard to provide fire-fighting and rescue services in response to all aircraft-related emergencies at the Lincoln Municipal Airport in Lincoln, Nebraska.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of June 12, 1996, as modified, to specify theat the Air National Guard shall have responsibility for providing fire-fighting and rescue services in response to all aircraft-related emergencies at the Lincoln Municipal Airport in Lincoln, Nebraska.

action.text: Bereuter amendment (A014) modified by unanimous consent. The modification makes a technical change to the amendment, deleting the term "primary or sole" responsibility for aircraft-related emergencies at the Lincoln Municipal Airport.
On agreeing to the Bereuter amendment (A014) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
